landing.title: Educational Blockchain Platform
landing.subtitle: Get in-demand knowledge and a real digital certificate with your transcript absolutely free. Our portal is built on blockchain technology, so all your data is secure and no one can alter your academic records.
landing.advantage1Desc: Gain access to a wide selection of online courses from experienced teachers and experts in various fields. Each course is designed with the latest standards and academic requirements to provide a highly beneficial and engaging learning experience.
landing.advantage2Desc: Access exciting video lectures from experienced mentors and take tests related to the lectures. The final test at the end of the course affects the issuance of the certificate.
landing.advantage3Desc: We ensure the integrity of tests with a reliable proctoring system that includes anti-cheating measures, facial movement monitoring, and activity tracking during exams.
landing.advantage4Desc: After successfully completing a course, you receive a certificate with a unique identifier based on blockchain technology, confirming your achievement.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How can I register on the platform and start learning?
faq.answer1: To register on our platform, please go to the registration page and fill in the required fields: your full name, email address, and password. After registration, you will receive a confirmation email. Follow the instructions in the email to activate your account. Once activated, you can log in, choose the courses you are interested in, and start learning.
faq.question2: What are the requirements for a computer or device to take the courses?
faq.answer2: To take courses on our platform, it is recommended to have a device (computer or laptop) with an internet connection. For taking tests, a built-in camera is required and a stable internet connection is necessary. We also recommend updating your browser to the latest version to ensure optimal performance and access to all features.
faq.question3: What advantages does using blockchain technology for certification offer?
faq.answer3: Using blockchain technology for course certification provides a high level of security and transparency. Certificates stored on the blockchain cannot be forged or altered, ensuring their authenticity. Additionally, access to the certificate is available at any time, and it will always remain secure due to the decentralized nature of blockchain.
faq.question4: How does the proctoring system work on the platform and how is exam integrity ensured?
faq.answer4: Our proctoring system conducts automatic monitoring without live proctors present. During the exam, the system tracks screen activity and camera movements to prevent cheating. Proctors can intervene and cancel results if suspicious behavior is detected.
faq.question5: How can I become a mentor on the platform and offer my own course?
faq.answer5: To become a mentor on our platform, you need to have experience and expertise in your field. Fill out the mentor application form, providing details about your experience, area of expertise, and course proposal. Our team will review your application and contact you to discuss further steps. We provide our mentors with a platform to work on and full support in creating and promoting their courses.

mentor.title: For Mentors
mentor.description: A mentor is <1>an experienced specialist and expert in their field who develops and provides online courses for teacher qualification improvement. The mentor creates engaging video lectures, tests, and interactive materials, shares their experience and knowledge, and provides support and feedback for learners. They use innovative teaching methods and track student progress to ensure the most valuable and engaging learning experience on the platform.</1>
mentor.possibility1: Creation and development of online courses in a convenient control panel.
mentor.possibility2: Adding video lectures and interactive materials to courses.
mentor.possibility3: Creating tests to assess learners' knowledge.
mentor.possibility4: Ability to set course type (open, paid, closed) with different access rules.
mentor.possibility5: Viewing course statistics and analytics to assess training effectiveness.
mentor.possibility6: Proctoring system to protect tests from cheating.
mentor.possibility8: Issuance of certificates to learners upon successful course completion.
mentor.possibility9: Use of blockchain technology to generate unique certificate identifiers and ensure their authenticity.
mentor.step1:
Creating an account. You must attach the following documents:
• Scan of an identity document.
• All necessary certificates confirming your level of knowledge.
mentor.step2: Email verification. You need to follow the link sent to your email.
mentor.step3: Waiting for data processing and verification. The administrator will manually verify your data within 5 business days. If everything is correct, your account will be activated.
mentor.step4: Done! Now you are a mentor. Start helping students, create your own courses, and develop your skills.
